```{r include = FALSE}
library(leaflet)
library(tidyverse)
library(widgetframe)
vacation <- read_csv("/Users/Jaycromwell/Desktop/R_Projects/jay_world_cities - Sheet1.csv")

m <-leaflet(vacation) %>%
    addTiles() %>%  # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles
    addMarkers(~lng,~lat, popup=vacation$desc)

```

See my travel map below:

```{r echo=FALSE}
frameWidget(m)
```
